```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

```{r}
# Erin is coding here
ces <- read_csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) + 
  geom_point()

```


```{r}
# Erin is coding here
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) + 
  geom_hex() +
  labs(x = "Percent of white people", y = "CalEnviroScreen pollution burden score")
```
